mapper.select: SELECT inventory.ID,PRICE,NUMBER,NAME,STORE_NAME FROM GOODS,STORE,inventory WHERE inventory.STORE_ID = STORE.ID AND inventory.GOODS_ID = GOODS.ID AND NUMBER > 0 GROUP BY inventory.ID
SELECT inventory.ID,PRICE,NUMBER,NAME,STORE_NAME FROM GOODS,STORE,inventory WHERE inventory.STORE_ID = STORE.ID AND inventory.GOODS_ID = GOODS.ID AND NUMBER > 0 AND STORE.ID=#{storeId}

SELECT inventory.ID,PRICE,NUMBER,NAME,STORE_NAME FROM GOODS,STORE,inventory WHERE inventory.STORE_ID = STORE.ID AND inventory.GOODS_ID = GOODS.ID AND NUMBER > 0 GROUP BY inventory.ID LIMIT #{start},#{end}

SELECT inventory.ID,PRICE,NUMBER,NAME,STORE_NAME FROM GOODS,STORE,inventory WHERE inventory.STORE_ID = STORE.ID AND inventory.GOODS_ID = GOODS.ID AND NUMBER > 0 AND NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') OR STORE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') GROUP BY inventory.ID
